body_html:
I've played a bit with using while_loop to build Hessians. The graph build time is significantly reduced (about an order of magnitude). Unfortunately, the evaluation time seems to be worse (about a factor of three worse). Would be nice if we could get the best of both worlds. The evaluation speed is also improved.

Full details here: #10830

body:
I've played a bit with using `while_loop` to build Hessians. The graph build time is significantly reduced (about an order of magnitude). <s>Unfortunately, the evaluation time seems to be worse (about a factor of three worse). Would be nice if we could get the best of both worlds.</s> The evaluation speed is also improved.

Full details here: #10830
